text: Direct Use
helpText: Direct use of Ecological End-Product means that the user or beneficiary directly extracts, interacts with, or physically senses the Ecological End-Product in its environment.

text: Direct Use - Raw material for transformation
helpText: Ecological End-Product is extracted or harvested and transformed into other commercial products

text: Direct Use - Raw material for transformation - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Distribution to other users
helpText: Ecological End-Product is extracted or harvested for distribution to other users

text: Direct Use - Distribution to other users - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Industrial processing
helpText: Ecological End-Product is extracted or harvested and directly used in other ways as a material in industrial processing

text: Direct Use - Industrial processing - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Transportation medium
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in situ as a medium for transporting goods or humans

text: Direct Use - Transportation medium - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Waste disposal/assimilation
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in situ as a sink for assimilating and disposing of waste

text: Direct Use - Waste disposal/assimilation - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Aesthetic appreciation
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in situ for aesthetic (visual and other senses) appreciation, separate from outdoor/nature recreational, tourist, cultural or spiritual activities

text: Direct Use - Aesthetic appreciation - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Fuel/energy
helpText: Ecological End-Product is directly used as an energy source for commercial production

text: Direct Use - Fuel/energy - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Fuel/energy - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Support of plant or animal cultivation
helpText: Ecological End-Product is directly used to support human cultivation of plant or animal life

text: Direct Use - Support of plant or animal cultivation - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Support of plant or animal cultivation - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Support of human health and life or subsistence
helpText: Ecological End-Product is  directly used by humans for subsistence, health, or other life support

text: Direct Use - Support of human health and life or subsistence - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Support of human health and life or subsistence - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Support for protection of human property
helpText: Ecological End-Product is directly used to protect human property from being damaged

text: Direct Use - Support for protection of human property - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Support for protection of human property - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Recreation/tourism
helpText: Ecological End-Product is directly used as part of an outdoor recreational or nature tourist activity

text: Direct Use - Recreation/tourism - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Recreation/tourism - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Cultural/spiritual activities
helpText: Ecological End-Product is directly used as part of a non-recreational cultural or spiritual activity

text: Direct Use - Cultural/spiritual activities - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Cultural/spiritual activities - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Information, science, education, and research
helpText: Ecological End-Product is directly used to support scientific research or education

text: Direct Use - Information, science, education, and research - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Information, science, education, and research - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Direct Use - Other direct use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is directly used for other purposes

text: Direct Use - Other direct use - Extractive use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in way that involves extraction or harvesting of the Ecological End-Product

text: Direct Use - Other direct use - In-situ use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is used in-place, in way that does not involve extraction

text: Non-use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is appreciated or valued by humans in a way that does not involve or require direct use or contact with the Ecological End-Product

text: Non-use - Existence
helpText: Ecological End-Product is appreciated or valued by humans for existence reasons (without direct use or contact)

text: Non-use - Bequest
helpText: Ecological End-Product is appreciated or valued by humans for bequest reasons (without direct use or contact)

text: Non-use - Other non-use
helpText: Ecological End-Product is appreciated or valued by humans for other reasons (without direct use or contact)
